Text: ENA Q Settlement Cc PST Dutch I am working on pulling together due diligence information for Global Finance in regards to ENA trading activity One number that stood out to us on the ENA PRMA detail was the Q settlement of approximately negative MM We discussed possible reasons for this figure with the ENA accounting group and they suggested it might be the Dec Nymex settlement which was more that negative MM They suggested that I could contact you for further insight Would you have a few minutes sometime today to talk about that settlement Thanks Ben
Meeting to discuss ENA Trading Cc PST Stacey White is going to meet with us in the new building to discuss ENA power trading
